declarations.comments: Runs a Snail computation
declarations.title: crawl

declarations.comments: Print a string to standard output
declarations.title: echo

declarations.comments: Print a string to standard error
declarations.title: err

declarations.comments: Pause the script for a given number of seconds
declarations.title: sleep

declarations.comments: Given a number of seconds n and a computation c, loop c every n seconds
declarations.title: loop

declarations.comments:
Run a command with an array of arguments, getting the output as a UTF8
encoded string.
declarations.title: run

declarations.comments: Run a command, disregarding the output.
declarations.title: command

declarations.comments: Send a process into the background.
declarations.title: fork

declarations.comments: Given a folder, partition its contents into files and subfolders.
declarations.title: ls

declarations.comments: Append a given string to the end of a given file.
declarations.title: appendFile

declarations.comments: Create or overwrite the given file with the given UTF8 string.
declarations.title: writeFile

declarations.comments: Get the contents of the given file.
declarations.title: cat

declarations.comments: Add a given string to the beginning of the given file.
declarations.title: prependFile

declarations.comments: Run the first computation, and stop if that fails. Otherwise run the second.
declarations.title: andandand

declarations.comments: Run the first computation, and stop if it succeeds.
declarations.title: ororor

declarations.comments: Check if a file or folder exists
declarations.title: exists

declarations.comments: Given a monadic boolean, run either the first thunked computation or the second.
declarations.title: mIf

declarations.comments: Run a given computation when a monadic boolean is true.
declarations.title: when

declarations.comments: Create a file with no contents.
declarations.title: touch

declarations.comments: Delete a given file.
declarations.title: rm

declarations.comments: Delete a given folder.
declarations.title: rmdir

declarations.comments: Create a given directory.
declarations.title: mkdir

declarations.comments: Get all the arguments to the script.
declarations.title: args

declarations.comments:
Get the arguments to the script, minus the first two, the first of which is
always "node", the second is the name of the file being executed.
declarations.title: params

declarations.comments:
Get the first non-mandatory argument, which must have necessarily been
provided.
declarations.title: input

declarations.comments: Exit the script with the given exit code.
declarations.title: exit

declarations.comments: Get the current environment.
declarations.title: printEnv

declarations.comments: Set the given environment variable to the given string value.
declarations.title: setVar

declarations.comments: Get the given environment variable's value.
declarations.title: getVar

declarations.comments:
Exit the script with the given exit code, printing the given message to
standard output if the exit code is 0, and standard error otherwise.
declarations.title: exitWith

declarations.comments: Extract the value of a Just, failing with a given error message otherwise.
declarations.title: fromJust

declarations.comments: Extract the value of a Maybe with a default if Nothing is found.
declarations.title: fromMaybe

declarations.comments: Extract the Right value of an Either, otherwise turn the Left into an error.
declarations.title: fromEither

modules.name: Snail.Path
modules.comments: Basic utility functions for dealing with paths
